long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pertento is a state-of-the-art A/B and multivariate testing platform. This extension provides access to the website editor, allowing you to make quick and precise changes to your website. 

Effortlessly create and manage experiments to optimise user experience and boost conversion rates. Enhance your website's performance and make data-driven decisions with Pertento.ai. 

**
Please note that this application requires an active subscription.
**
